channel.title: Need Help with an Ad/Flier. reward = <3
channel.description:
I was wondering if somebody could reconstruct this a little. Its for my dad's company, and he wanted me to shape it up. I want it to have the same general layout and feel to it (plain and simple), but it could use some improvements. My dad wants it to have the same wording, but maybe a new picture. I would greatly appreciate anybody could do this for me, and you will have my eternal love <3 I know some of you guys are really good in that 'elegant' type of work, and I would rather leave my trust in your skills over mine. A PSD would be nice as well, so further adjustments will be pain-free.
the flier: http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/7657/charterfundingcopyna8.png
And at the moment, this is what I threw together to stall for time. I wish it actually looked somewhat appealing http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/7934/charterfundingfireworkses3.gif

item.title: Need Help with an Ad/Flier. reward = <3
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Your dad’s company sounds trampy if they are getting you to make their artwork. lolol

Well, when my step dads company was going to set up a website they went to this web design business thing, and they said they would set it up and look after it for him for £4.000, and my step dad knowing nothing about it was like “YER OK”, so i was liek “OK WTF I B SET UP A SITE FOR U FOR FREE”, so in the end it isnt trampy, its easier, its cheaper and im always around to sort it out

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with an Ad/Flier. reward = <3

item.title: Need Help with an Ad/Flier. reward = <3
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

lolol

I’m making them because the guys who they hired suck worse than me. My dad wanted some things changed and they kept saying they’re “busy”. As if they don’t have enough time to draw shit stuff like that for a living.
And I did it for free, and in 10 mins
O wells.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with an Ad/Flier. reward = <3
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Century gothic. The guys that put it together originally used the same font throughout the whole thing. I just re-did all of it and put in red white and blue colors.

Basically, I want a completely new flier that looks very professional and appealing. Something worth 50 bucks
Since I’m no good at that, I only changed colors for the time being.

Read full topic
